import React, { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { handleAddQuestion } from "../actions/questions" class NewQuestion extends Component { state = { optionOne: "", optionTwo: "", toHome: false, } handleChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value this.setState((previousState) => ({ ...previousState, [e.target.name]: value, })) } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { optionOne, optionTwo } = this.state const { dispatch, id } = this.props dispatch(handleAddQuestion(optionOne, optionTwo)) this.setState(() => ({ optionOne: "", optionTwo: "", toHome: id ? false : true, })) } render() { const { optionOne, optionTwo } = this.state return (

Create New Question

) } } export default connect()(NewQuestion)
